29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

125435.name: Tracks of Destiny
125435.lore: Your victory is secured by countless failures, and the small steps you have taken led you to the turning point of fate.

270195.name: Guardian's Lament
270195.lore:
Together with this visor, the twisted wish of a Guardian also lies broken.
She had wanted to find a way out for her people to escape the Everwinter, but ended up becoming a puppet of a consciousness beyond her.

"Supreme Guardian, the title passed down to generations of Belobog's rulers, the one who looked after all the people — It never occurred to anyone that the Guardians themselves also long for care and protection."

409960.name: Traveler's Guide
409960.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>20,000</nobr> Character EXP.
409960.lore:
Required reading for world exploration. Press the "Read" button to tune in to an attractive voice in a language you understand, telling you about the legendary encounters of renowned adventurers across different worlds as well as the precious wisdom and knowledge that they have gathered.

"All-new series of the Traveler's Guide, The Chef's Manual to Galactic Cuisine, is now available for purchase."
"For submissions, please connect to synesthesia beacon ERD-23θ to contact an Intelligentsia Guild representative. Method of payment can be arranged to your convenience."

409961.name: Adventure Log
409961.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>5000</nobr> Character EXP.
409961.lore:
A neatly organized collection of educational adventure notes containing countless illustrations and texts entailing adventures from beginning to end, as well as valuable information and survival-related techniques.

"Why not just digitize it and save it on a photolith disk? That'd be much more convenient."
"Advanced technology is far more fragile than you'd think when faced with stellar storms and neuron flow eruptions. Besides, I'm sure the author of this book wanted people to read it in the simplest of ways."

409962.name: Travel Encounters
409962.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>1000</nobr> Character EXP.
409962.lore:
A travel diary with messy handwriting and random content. It's not of much use to you.

"Dan Heng, hurry up and finish reading it so you can throw it away."

468391.name: Golden Crown of the Past Shadow
468391.desc: Headwear of the Decaying Shadow. Can be used for the Ascension of Imaginary characters.
468391.lore:
Accessory left behind by the shadow of a past Guardian, telling tales of the city of Everwinter.

"Alina the Loving — her kindness as lofty as the sky and her compassion as brilliant as gold."

549503.name: Artifex's Module
549503.desc: Components used in Xianzhou's ingenium creations. Crude material used for enhancement.
549503.lore:
The foundation of Xianzhou's ingenium technology. The smallest constituent of all machine parts. Breaking it apart would be akin to destroying the cellular structure of a living being.

"The Intelligentsia Guild put up a bounty of two million credits for technical plans that can flawlessly disassemble Xianzhou mechanical puppets."
"If you know Screwllum, then these two millions are basically yours to take..."

633444.name: Artifex's Cogwheel
633444.desc: Parts of the Xianzhou machines. Normal material used for enhancement.
633444.lore:
The connective components used in Xianzhou's ingenium technology. The intricate and thin teeth of the cogwheels are as minute as mustard seeds, and yet are interconnected to form a complex body, making the machine able to pass as true life.

"Its form lies in harmony, a parallel to nature. Its movements cyclical, echoing the cosmos."
comeFrom: Entranced Ingenia at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher

635671.name: Seed of Abundance
635671.desc: A seed of blessing sown by the Aeon of Abundance. Used to level up Traces slightly for Abundance characters.
635671.lore:
Those who come in contact with it are slowly healed of their wounds and illnesses.
People who pray for the blessing of life while in despair will always have their prayers answered.

"You shall be granted what you ask for."

717385.name: Artifex's Gyreheart
717385.desc: Components used in Xianzhou's ingenium creations. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717385.lore:
The core of Xianzhou's ingenium technology. The armillary sphere roils and vibrates like the essence of a heart, making the machine think like a living being.

"Do not be startled. Taking away its heart would make him... her?... No, make it lose its sentience and return to its mechanical sources."
comeFrom: Entranced Ingenia at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

836257.name: Flower of Eternity
836257.desc: A gorgeous flower blooming from the Sprout of Life. Used to level up Traces significantly for Abundance characters.
836257.lore:
The stamen contains the concentrated power of the Path of Abundance, ensuring the flower's ever-lasting vitality. No fire, ice, or any harshness can hinder the growth of this magnificent life form.
Given time, its leaves shall feed upon starlight. Its roots shall burrow into the flesh of every being of this world, all-connected, never-perishing. Its fruits shall fulfill the promise of immortality.

"There be giant ships, eclipsing mountains, drifting over the void. Upon them grows the undying tree. Its consumption grants immortality."

920198.name: Sprout of Life
920198.desc: A young sprout emerging from the Seed of Abundance. Used to level up Traces moderately for Abundance characters.
920198.lore:
Radiating warmth, life and growth flourish around the place where it sinks its roots. Barren wastelands turn into luscious grass fields, withered plants rejuvenate and blossom, and springs burst through the ground to moisten the land.
As you get closer to it, your muscles and bones twitch and propagate with an unbearable itch.

"Life is unfailing where the soul abounds."

ranks.name: Ablution of the Quick
ranks.descHash: While the Field is active, ATK of all allies increases by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>.

ranks.name: Bestowal From the Pure
ranks.descHash: When his Skill is triggered, if the target ally's HP is lower than <nobr>50%</nobr>, Luocha's Outgoing Healing increases by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>. If the target ally's HP is at <nobr>50%</nobr> or higher, the ally receives a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr> of Luocha's ATK plus <nobr>#3[i]</nobr>, lasting for <nobr>#4[i]</nobr> turns.

ranks.name: Surveyal by the Fool
ranks.descHash:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

ranks.name: Heavy Lies the Crown
ranks.descHash: When Luocha's Field is active, enemies become Weakened and deal <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> less DMG.

ranks.name: Cicatrix 'Neath the Pain
ranks.descHash:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

ranks.name: Reunion With the Dust
ranks.descHash: When Ultimate is used, there is a <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> fixed chance to reduce all enemies' All-Type RES by <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr> for <nobr>#3[i]</nobr> turn(s).

skills.descHash: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to #1[i]% of Luocha's ATK to a single enemy.
skills.name: Thorns of the Abyss

skills.descHash:
After using his Skill, Luocha immediately restores the target ally's HP equal to #1[i]% of Luocha's ATK plus #2[i]. Meanwhile, Luocha gains 1 stack of Abyss Flower.
When any ally's HP percentage drops to #3[i]% or lower, an effect equivalent to Luocha's Skill will immediately be triggered and applied to this ally for one time (without consuming Skill Points). This effect can be triggered again after #4[i] turn(s).
skills.name: Prayer of Abyss Flower

skills.descHash: Removes #2[i] buff(s) from all enemies and deals all enemies Imaginary DMG equal to #1[i]% of Luocha's ATK. At the same time, Luocha gains 1 stack of Abyss Flower.
skills.name: Death Wish

skills.descHash:
When Abyss Flower reaches #1[i] stacks, Luocha consumes all stacks of Abyss Flower to deploy a Field against the enemy.
When any enemy in the Field is attacked by an ally, the attacking ally's HP is immediately restored by an amount equal to #2[f1]% of Luocha's ATK plus #4[i].
The Field's effect lasts for #3[i] turns. When Luocha is knocked down, the Field will be dispelled.
skills.name: Cycle of Life

skills.descHash: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
skills.name: Attack

skills.descHash: After the Technique is used, the Talent will be immediately triggered at the start of the next battle.
skills.name: Mercy of a Fool

embedBonusSkill.descHash: When the Skill's effect is triggered, removes <nobr>#1[i]</nobr> debuff(s) from a target ally.
embedBonusSkill.name: Cleansing Revival

embedBonusSkill.descHash: When any enemy in the Field is attacked by an ally, all allies (except the attacker) restore HP equal to <nobr>#1[f1]%</nobr> of Luocha's ATK plus <nobr>#2[i]</nobr>.
embedBonusSkill.name: Sanctified

embedBonusSkill.descHash: The chance to resist Crowd Control debuffs increases by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>.
embedBonusSkill.name: Through the Valley

voiceItems.title: First Meeting
voiceItems.text: I'm a traveling merchant, merely passing through. The name's Luocha.

voiceItems.title: Greeting
voiceItems.text: We got up early to press on with our journey. Did you sleep well last night?

voiceItems.title: Parting
voiceItems.text: Have an early rest. I'll keep watch here.

voiceItems.title: About Myself: Art of Healing
voiceItems.text: I have no one to rely on as a traveling merchant. There is at least some security when I have some ways of saving myself.

voiceItems.title: Chat: The Coffin
voiceItems.text: The coffin draws attention. As a traveling merchant, it helped me a lot. Everyone is curious about the coffin, so they come up to ask me about it. As I answer them, the business is done.

voiceItems.title: Hobbies
voiceItems.text: There are always differences between what I hear about a place and seeing it with my own eyes. Finding out the differences between these perceptions is my joy.

voiceItems.title: Annoyances
voiceItems.text: When in a difficult situation, it's not so important to maintain who you truly are, but to find the suitable role to play... Ah, that's just my own experience.

voiceItems.title: Something to Share
voiceItems.text: The meaning of a flower lies in the duration of its bloom, and not in its petals, aroma, or the seeds it leaves behind.

voiceItems.title: Knowledge
voiceItems.text: I have long heard that the Xianzhou can preserve their beauty, and have found that to be true. However, they keep this secret by hiding in a corner of the galaxy, like sitting on a mountain of wealth without spending it... What a shame.

voiceItems.title: About Jing Yuan
voiceItems.text: Not only is the general an expert in perceiving people's intentions, but he is also a master of the arts of concealment and showmanship. When he decides to "show" something, it's time to be careful.

voiceItems.title: About Yanqing
voiceItems.text: Oh, you mean the young boy? The one who's always by the general? I don't know anything about him...

voiceItems.title: About Yukong
voiceItems.text: Unlike her, very few can realize that they are nothing but a tiny mustard seed in this vast galaxy... She is worthy of my respect.

voiceItems.title: About Tingyun
voiceItems.text: It's hard to forget anything Tingyun says. The Foxians' talent with words should be utilized to its maximum potential, no?

voiceItems.title: About Sushang
voiceItems.text: She's kind and always willing to help. She invited me to "tea and storytelling" the next time I'm on the Xianzhou. I'm not so sure about the storytelling — sounds time-consuming.

voiceItems.title: About Jingliu
voiceItems.text: That sword she holds in her heart has long since split heaven and earth... but having harnessed that kind of power, she is no longer a mere master of the sword.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing Trailblaze Mission "Obsequies Performed, A Long Road Ahead"

voiceItems.title: Eidolon Activation
voiceItems.text: Nothing is truly new in the universe, but thanks to you, I now see things in a new way.

voiceItems.title: Character Ascension
voiceItems.text: It takes time and patience for a seed to grow.

voiceItems.title: Max Level Reached
voiceItems.text: The passage of our lives is a brief affair, but it brings more joy than the immortality of the Aeons.

voiceItems.title: Trace Activation
voiceItems.text: What happened in the past is destined to return — I won't stand still to delay this encounter.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Sushang
voiceItems.text: I am not well-versed in the art of combat. I leave this to you, Miss Sushang.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Jing Yuan
voiceItems.text: Would you prefer me to reveal or conceal, General?

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Jingliu
voiceItems.text: An enemy worthy of your attention is a formidable enemy.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Dan Heng
voiceItems.text: Yet another journey with you.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae
voiceItems.text: Yet another journey with you, Imbibitor Lunae.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Blade
voiceItems.text: Shame. I can't give you the burial that you seek.

voiceItems.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
voiceItems.text: Time to settle your accounts.

voiceItems.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
voiceItems.text: Don't get complacent.

voiceItems.title: Turn Begins 1
voiceItems.text: Pity. You chose the wrong enemy.

voiceItems.title: Turn Begins 2
voiceItems.text: Allow me to see you off.

voiceItems.title: Turn Idling
voiceItems.text: What is it we're waiting for?

voiceItems.title: Basic ATK
voiceItems.text: Hmph.

voiceItems.title: Skill 1
voiceItems.text: Abyss Flower, bloom.

voiceItems.title: Skill 2
voiceItems.text: Receive divinity!

voiceItems.title: Hit by Light Attack
voiceItems.text: Nothing major.

voiceItems.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
voiceItems.text: I underestimated you.

voiceItems.title: Ultimate: Activate
voiceItems.text: Eternal sleep is not the end...

voiceItems.title: Ultimate: Unleash
voiceItems.text: The dead will return!

voiceItems.title: Talent
voiceItems.text: That which is seized, must be repaid!

voiceItems.title: Downed
voiceItems.text: It cannot... come to pass...

voiceItems.title: Return to Battle
voiceItems.text: You see? I've returned.

voiceItems.title: Health Recovery
voiceItems.text: I feel much better.

voiceItems.title: Technique
voiceItems.text: Let's wait and see.

voiceItems.title: Battle Won
voiceItems.text: A moment's excitement. Nothing more.

voiceItems.title: Treasure Opening 1
voiceItems.text: Take it, if it's to your liking.

voiceItems.title: Treasure Opening 2
voiceItems.text: The enjoyment of collecting.

voiceItems.title: Precious Treasure Opening
voiceItems.text: Quality merchandise.

voiceItems.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
voiceItems.text: Hardly worth mentioning.

voiceItems.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
voiceItems.text: A traveling merchant needs a knowledge of puzzles.

voiceItems.title: Enemy Target Found
voiceItems.text: Trouble ahead... Proceed. I'm with you.

voiceItems.title: Returning to Town
voiceItems.text: It's hard for a wanderer to find rest in this world.

storyItems.title: Character Details
storyItems.text:
An elegant and handsome blond young man who carries a giant coffin on his back.
As an intergalactic merchant, he was unfortunately caught in the Xianzhou Luofu's Stellaron crisis.
And that is how he found his mastery of medicine to come in handy.

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part I
storyItems.text:
"What's your occupation?"
"Traveling merchant."
"What is the purpose of your entry?"
"Commercial business."
"Do you vow not to violate the laws and regulations of the Xianzhou Alliance, to conduct business activities in accordance with the law, and not to conduct activities outside the scope of the visa permit?"
"Of course. I will follow the law."
"Do you vow not to conduct any illegal research related to immortality?"
"I... promise."
"Great, please sign here."

"Mr. Luocha, welcome to the Xianzhou Luofu."

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part II
storyItems.text:
"Hey, do you still remember that guy? Came here often, carries a huge box..."
"You mean Luocha?"
"Yeah, Luocha... He's an Outworlder, right? But from the way he works and speaks, he feels like those older Xianzhou natives. Has he lived here for long? But then again, he had kept his unique and exotic fashion style..."
"Who knows? Maybe it's because his blond hair doesn't match the clothing of Xianzhou."

He would sometimes think of home.
The devils, the church, the insanity... None of those are good memories.
People would clamber to high places in groups just so they could witness their city's demise.
If everything were to end, then there shall be at least one witness.

"Why do you still wear the clothes of your home world?" Someone asked.
"It reminds me of the path I must keep treading. That is all," Luocha answered.

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part III
storyItems.text:
The people of Xianzhou do not recognize coffins.
Each time Luocha emerged on the streets with the coffin, curious gaze followed.
If someone were to ask him, "What exactly is this?"
Luocha will answer, vaguely, "This is the tool of my trade."

"Tool of my trade... I hope I didn't offend you," Luocha stood in a pavillion in the Exalting Sanctum, murmuring to himself, "But then again, our relationship does count as a business relationship, doesn't it?"

The coffin responded with silence.

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part IV
storyItems.text:
Luocha carried the coffin on his back and headed into the distance.
The coffin made no sound. It did not protest and had no right to protest.
"When you keep silent, you are free."

The curtains closed, and he left the guilt behind.
Guilt is just another weapon to be controlled, a lie one tells themselves to believe they will one day obtain a correct answer.
"What's so different about you? Is your pain more valuable and more moving than other people's?"

"Go to the Xianzhou," the one who gave him the coffin said, "Don't forget your promise."
"Never."

Luocha promised, but silently made another vow.

name: Luocha
descHash: Carrying a coffin wherever he goes, he is a foreign trader who came from beyond the stellar seas. Has excellent medical skills.
